The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 14 January is 2,834,341 (5,035.5 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 09 January, there were 350,264 new confirmed cases (622.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 02 January, there were 346,768 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 1% (3,496 extra cases).
